meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing silver.
meanings.sent1: The argental jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The moon cast an argental glow over the lake.
meanings.sent3: The argental coins jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had an argental quality that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The argental sheen of the car made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: Resembling silver in color or luster.
meanings.sent1: The argental paint on the walls gave the room a modern look.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had an argental sheen that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The argental clouds in the sky looked like a painting.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an argental quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The argental shimmer of the lake made it a peaceful spot for fishing.
